RTCPeerConnectionGetTransceivers.summary: The getTransceivers() method of the interface returns a list of the objects being used to send and receive data on the connection.
RTCPeerConnectionGetTransceivers.returns:
An array of the objects representing the transceivers handling sending and receiving all media on the RTCPeerConnection.
The array is in the order in which the transceivers were added to the connection.
The array does not include transceivers that have already been stopped (following offer/answer).
